name: british country garden blanket
sizes_available: can be adjusted to make any size - baby to adult.
notes:
[find the pattern here.][1]

celebrate the beauty of the garden with the **2026 collaborative crochet along blanket**! 

this stunning mosaic crochet blanket brings together the talents of 10 amazing designers, each contributing a unique motif inspired by plants and blooms that might be found in a british country garden. from tulips to poppies and everything in between, each section is a joy to crochet and a delight to display.

the pattern uses overlay mosaic crochet, and whether you’re an experienced crocheter or an advanced beginner, the detailed written instructions, clear charts, and video tutorials will guide you every step of the way.

key features:

- 11 unique designer motifs, forming a cohesive, collaborative blanket
- overlay mosaic crochet technique
- written and graphical instructions [inside the ebook][2]
- [free graphs][3] for each section
- beginner-friendly video tutorials demonstrating the key techniques
- adaptable size to suit your project
- large print option
- a supportive community to share your
  progress and stay inspired

start your cal journey today and enjoy the calming, rewarding process of creating a blanket full of colour, life, and charm — one stitch at a time!

**please note that the yardage is based on a five-repeat wide, single-sided blanket.**

colour a (cream) - 3265m/3571 yds
colour b (green) - apx. 934m/1022 yds
colour c (pink) - apx. 542m/593 yds
colour d (purple) - apx. 531m/581 yds
colour e (yellow) - apx. 354m/388 yds
[yarn pack available via wool warehouse.][4]

final size (before border) apx. 135 by 193cm/54 by 77.5 inches.
